Alex K Gold is a Solutions Engineer at RStudio. He lives in Washington DC. This is his website, which includes speaking and writing Alex has done.

Before coming to RStudio, Alex was a data scientist working on economic policy research, political campaigns, and healthcare. He is a proud economics PhD dropout.

When not data nerd-ing, Alex loves spending time with his wife, doing handstands, and cooking.
